title: Press Trust of India: PM Modi recalls profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ on Good Friday
text: Updated: Mar 29 2024 9:12AM New Delhi, Mar 29 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi remembered the "profound sacrifice" of Jesus Christ on Good Friday, saying it teaches people compassion and forgiveness. He said on X, "Today, on Good Friday, we remember the profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ. May everyone find strength in the lessons of compassion and forgiveness it teaches us." Christians across the world observe Good Friday to commemorate the crucifixion of Christ. PTI KR . Please log in to get detailed story.
